description: Digikam helps me since years to organize my thousands of photos. Thanks for it. I had given a donation also...
Great app for managing a lot of photos and with the kipi plugin can also do some basic editing.
summary: One of the best in the category

description: digikam can easily be called the best digital media management tool.
A very complete photo application

I'm full time photographer and i was start using fedora recently and i'm searching 
for a great app for my photo editing, one i'm searching on net then i'm found this on 
www.techgindia.com

really thanks to #Developers and #techgindia.com

Amazing breadth of functionality, by far the most powerful open-source photo management app. Only minor quibble is that the user interface can be a bit busy with all the features available. However, very much recommended if you take photo management seriously.
DigiKam is garbage for anyone that does work off line. Don't bother installing it, it is worthless, because it will not WORK !
summary: Junk unless you do ALL your work online

description: Would love to use the app. However, after installation the app does not launch.
Installed, tried to launch... Rebooted machine, tried to launch... Removed...
If i run from command line, this is error, `/snap/digikam/6/usr/bin/digikam: error while loading shared libraries: libQt5Sql.so.5: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory`
... need to remove it. Looked promising, though.
Installed this application twice, rebooted and still it will not launch at all!

It gives you full control over everything!
Every function I've missed from Google Photos are to be found here.

Have done all of the usual gymnastics and, lo, it refuses to install. Never had this problem with the previous version.
I have tried the methods in the digikam.org and softpedia.
My system runs Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS and Gnome 3.28.2.
Does it take videos

Easy control
great editing tools
but needs an update on its appearance......
no words,everything is said

1. Doesn't recognise External/USB drive, if you try to add a "collection" from External/USB

2. Crashes on "Import" from External/USB devices

3. Cannot create a folder on Piwigo.

Digikam is the best photo manager I've seen. Its pretty simple to use but give you some massively useful tools. No matter what way you organize your life if you enjoy organizing it and you like metadata you'll want digikam..
summary: Simply The Best in Photo Management

description: What a horrible piece of software, ugly interface and does not show many of my images even though they are JPG. It was the third time I installed this forgetting how bad it was and immediately uninstalled it. shotwell is so far the best open source photo manager I have used in Linux followed by ART for photo editing.
When I try opening Settings it crashes my whole Gnome session on Ubuntu 20.04. It's a 100% reproducible bug. Incredible.
summary: It is crashing my whole Gnome session

description: The best photo catalog software I can find! It's simple to use and I can sort and search by tags without convoluted menus. I can also store photos by year and month and it preserves that structure.
A professional program for managing photos. Not suited to general users. The flatpak release works well.

This is a great tool but I found I needed to download Flatseal and edit the file permissions to let it see all user files. Only then could I see the photos, as I stored them outside of pictures directory

Das Programm sieht vielversprechend aus, aber meine Fotos befinden sich auf einer externen Festplatte und damit kommt Digicam nicht zurecht. Es böleibt hängen, liest die Bilder nicht ein, friert komplett ein. Daher für mich unbrauchbar.
summary: Kann mit grossen Sammlungen von ext. SSD nicht umgehen

description: Ich nutze digikam schon seit Jahren um meine Bilder zu verwalten. Und es wird immer besser und umfangreicher. Nur zur Bildbearbeitung nutze ich lieber eine anderes Tool.
Die Verwaltung großer Sammlungen ist damit ein Kinderspiel
Nada que envidiar a los grandes y privativos softwares, cubre todas mis necesidades relativas a la catalogación de fotografías.
funciona bien y es rápido
En funcionalidades no le falta nada y aún es más rápido que los demás, tiene funciones que ningún otro tiene para el escritorio Linux.
Le paquet snap ne fonctionne pas sous ubuntu 18.04
summary: le paquet snap ne fonctionne pas

description:
Sous Fedora 33 impossible de voir les photos de l'album. De plus certaines modifications dans les parametres font friser Digikam. Pourtant Showphoto fonctionne à merveille pourquoi ???
J'ai adopter Showphoto!!
Je l'utilise depuis des années en complément de Darktable. Très utile pour cataloguer ses photos et faire des retouches de base
Хорошая программа в смысле возможностей, но интерфейс слишком ужасен, ни о каком единстве оформления с системой даже речи быть не может.
